page.title: 01 Description of our area
page.content: The block comprises of mainly rural with some residential areas.The eastern ,and predominantly residential part of town of Monmouth,namely the Hereford Road and Osbaston area are covered.The picturesque,small village of Rockfield with the nearby Hendre estate(the home of the Rolls family)are to the west of the area.The greater part of the area is rural with numerous scattered farms overlooking the scenic Monnow and Wye Valley. As a result of its approximation to the border,there has been great activity within the area through the ages.It provides a gateway into Wales via the A40 and is a centre of communications with long distance bus routes stopping in the town. Its history,schools and scenery have attracted residents and visitors from all parts of the U.K. and from abroad.
